channel.title: How do i go on any server?
channel.description:
hi i'm very new to moparscape and i have downloaded the moparscape .ther are cars in the background on loading screen it comes up and how do i get on any server.can i radomly choose passwords and usernames and ips?
it comes up server must be down.click start to create 1. i do that the same things happens
all help apprciated.

item.title: How do i go on any server?
item.dc:creator: @lil_wizzy lil wizzy
item.description:
@lil_wizzy wrote:

he means how to play a server someone is made…

well the thing to do is go to server adveritsement, best thing to do is look for a server with no-ip.

once you have found a server, copy its ip. now go to the moparscape client, go to file > new server and paste the ip. now click ok. now go to enter and put in any username and pass.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i go on any server?

item.title: How do i go on any server?
item.dc:creator: @FEARSCAPE FEARSCAPE
item.description:
@FEARSCAPE wrote:

If you want to know what to do in dis situation read this…

Step 1:(If you dont have Moparscape 3.2/Aryan)You can go to http://uppit.com/NCD3S, and then wait for it to you see ‘Download’. Or you can go to www.moparisthebest.com, if the webclient dosen’t come up then just stick with the UPPIT download situation.

Step 2:When it has finished double click it. Then a file download popup will appear.

Step 3:You can click ‘Run’ or ‘Save’…dosen’t matter.

Step 4:After your done installing it…(takes around less then 2 mins)

Step 5:The moparscape icon should be placed onto your desktop. After that, double click it so it will pull up the program.

Step 6:When you have pulled it up go to ‘Help’ and you will go down and see ‘Server Status’. Click on that and it will pull up.

Step 7:Now that you have pulled up ‘Server Status’ scroll down and find something like…‘FEAR SCAPE’(the name, and its mine :D)

Step 8:If its online and you find it, you can highlight the ip which is 71.75.83.182 . Then the port is 43594(which you don’t put in only if you have already have it changed, because you when you start the program ‘Moparscape 3.2 Webclient’ it always starts out that port)

Step 9:After you have the ip and port all ready to go type in a username and password(donot use your real username and pass, because the owners can see your pass SO BE CAREFUL OF WHAT YOU PUT!)

FINAL STEP:Then when you have the download complete, and everything else(this is REALLY hard :P) click on ‘Login’. If this dosen’t work saying something like 'Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click “Cancel” then “Start Server” to make your own’ just try another ip and port. One of them should at least work.

Have fun! ;D
RATE ME ON MY EXPLAIN

Read full topic
item.source: How do i go on any server?

item.title: How do i go on any server?
item.dc:creator: @nemesis nemesis
item.description:
@nemesis wrote:

you mean starting server?
Go to downloads section download source like FinScape its good source by me
then extract it and open it then click run server and open moparscape client.
Then type name and password and finally LOG IN.
if u want admin go to characters and open name of account you want to admin there should read
PlayerRights or something liek that change the 0 to 2.

im glad to help newbies.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 04:08:55 AM[/size][hr]Or if you want join to server.
go to www.moparisthebest.com then click server status page.
copy an ip of there and write it to moparscape,then choose username and password then login.
if it dont log in find new ip address

and again im glad to help noobs

Read full topic
